# Basic Function Example
Create a function called greet
It should take a name parameter
Return a greeting message with the name

# Simple Calculator
Create a calculator function
It should take two numbers and an operation
If operation is "add", return sum
If operation is "subtract", return difference
If operation is "multiply", return product
If operation is "divide", check for zero and return quotient

# List Processing
Create a function to process a list of numbers
Calculate the sum of all numbers
Calculate the average
Find the minimum and maximum values
Return a dictionary with these statistics

# String Manipulation
Create a function to clean text
Remove leading and trailing whitespace
Convert to lowercase
Remove special characters
Return the cleaned text

# File Operations
Create a function to read a file
Take filename as parameter
Open the file in read mode
Read all contents
Close the file and return contents
Handle file not found errors
